trans-unit.source: TextEncoder encodes a JavaScript string into bytes using the UTF-8 encoding and returns the resulting Uint8Array of those bytes. TextDecoder does the reverse.

trans-unit.source: compassneedscalibration supported in IE11 only for compatible devices with Windows 8.1+.

console.time() starts a timer you can use to track how long an operation takes. You give each timer a unique name, and may have up to 10,000 timers running on a given page. When you call console.timeEnd() with the same name, the browser will output the time, in milliseconds, that elapsed since the timer was started. These functions are not always available in workers. For example, in Firefox, they are available from version 38. More on using the console on mobile devices, see here.
trans-unit.target: console.time() 启动一个计时器，您可以使用该计时器跟踪操作花费的时间。您为每个计时器指定一个唯一的名称，并且在给定页面上最多可以运行10,000个计时器。当您使用相同的名称调用 console.timeEnd() 时，浏览器将输出自计时器启动以来经过的时间（以毫秒为单位）。这些功能并非总是在 workers 可用。例如，在Firefox中，它们可以从版本 38 获得。有关在移动设备上使用 console 更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: display: contents causes an element's children to appear as if they were direct children of the element's parent, ignoring the element itself. This can be useful when a wrapper element should be ignored when using CSS grid or similar layout techniques.
trans-unit.target: display: contents 使元素的子元素看起来像是元素父元素的直接子元素，而忽略了元素本身。当使用CSS网格或类似布局技术时应忽略包装元素时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: A KeyboardEvent property representing the physical key that was pressed, ignoring the keyboard layout and ignoring whether any modifier keys were active.

trans-unit.source: A KeyboardEvent property that indicates the location of the key on the input device. Useful when there are more than one physical key for the same logical key (e.g. left or right "Control" key; main or numpad "1" key).
trans-unit.target: 一个 KeyboardEvent 属性，它指示键在输入设备上的位置。当同一逻辑键有多个物理键时（例如，左或右“ Control”键；主或数字键盘“ 1”键），此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: A KeyboardEvent property whose value is a string identifying the key that was pressed. Covers character keys, non-character keys (e.g. arrow keys), and dead keys.
trans-unit.target: 一个 KeyboardEvent 属性，其值为字符串，该字符串标识所按下的键。涵盖了字符键，非字符键（例如，箭头键）和无效键。

trans-unit.source: A CSS Snap Points based carousel (and lightweight polyfill)

A CSS keyword value that resets a property's value to the default specified by the browser in its UA stylesheet, as if the webpage had not included any CSS. For example, display:revert on a <div> would result in display:block. This is in contrast to the initial value, which is simply defined on a per-property basis, and for display would be inline.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS关键字值，用于将属性的值重置为浏览器在其UA样式表中指定的默认值，就好像该网页未包含任何CSS。例如， <div> 上的 display:revert 将导致 display:block 。这与仅基于每个属性定义的 initial 值形成对比，并且用于 display 将是 inline 。

trans-unit.source: A CSS value that will apply a property's initial value as defined in the CSS specification that defines the property
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS值,它将应用定义属性的CSS规范中定义的属性的初始值。

trans-unit.source: A CSS value that will apply the existing color value to other properties like background-color, etc.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS值，它将现有的 color 值应用于其他属性，例如 background-color 等。

trans-unit.source: A CSS value that's the same as "inherit" if a property is inherited or "initial" if a property is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS值,如果一个属性被继承,则与 "继承 "相同,如果一个属性没有被继承,则与 "初始 "相同。

trans-unit.source: A DOM event interface that can carry custom application-defined data.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以携带自定义应用定义数据的DOM事件接口。

A contiguous range of content in a Document, DocumentFragment or Attr
trans-unit.target: 文档、DocumentFragment或Attr中内容的连续范围。

A mechanism that allows developers to set certain rules and policies for a given site. The rules can change default browser behaviour, block certain features or set limits on resource usage. Document Policy is useful both for security and performance, and is similar to Permissions Policy.
A modern image format based on the AV1 video format. AVIF generally has better compression than WebP, JPEG, PNG and GIF and is designed to supersede them.
A new security header: Referrer Policy
A parent with overflow set to auto will prevent position: sticky from working in Safari

trans-unit.source: A policy that controls how much information is shared through the HTTP referrer header. Helps to protect user privacy.
A promise represents the eventual result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 承诺表示异步操作的最终结果。

trans-unit.source: A property representing the text within a DOM element and its descendants. As a getter, it approximates the text the user would get if they highlighted the contents of the element with the cursor and then copied to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示DOM元素及其子元素中的文本的属性,作为一个获取者,它近似于用户用光标高亮显示元素的内容,然后复制到剪贴板。作为一个获取者,它近似于用户用光标高亮该元素的内容,然后复制到剪贴板的文本。

trans-unit.source: A responsive images method to control which image resource a user agent presents to a user, based on resolution, media query and/or support for a particular image format
trans-unit.target: 一种响应式图像方法,用于根据分辨率、媒体查询和/或对特定图像格式的支持,控制用户代理向用户呈现哪些图像资源。

trans-unit.source: A security mechanism that allows developers to explicitly enable or disable various powerful browser features for a given site. Similar to Document Policy.
A set of cipher suites used in Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol, using ChaCha20 for symmetric encryption and Poly1305 for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 传输层安全(TLS)协议中使用的一套密码套件,使用ChaCha20进行对称加密,使用Poly1305进行认证。

trans-unit.source: A shorthand property for resetting all CSS properties except for direction and unicode-bidi.
trans-unit.target: 用于重置所有CSS属性（ direction 和 unicode-bidi 除外）的简写属性。

trans-unit.source: A similar effect can be achieved in Firefox 4+ using the -moz-element() background property
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4+中使用-moz-元素()背景属性也可以实现类似的效果。

trans-unit.source: A standard way to override the size of viewport in web page using the @viewport rule, standardizing and replacing Apple's own popular <meta> viewport implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一种使用 @viewport 规则覆盖网页中视口大小的标准方法，以标准化和替代Apple自己流行的 <meta> 视口实现。

trans-unit.source: A strict form of HTML, and allows embedding of other XML languages
trans-unit.target: HTML的严格形式,并允许嵌入其他XML语言。

trans-unit.source: A way to allow websites to invoke the native sharing capabilities of the host platform
trans-unit.target: 允许网站调用主机平台的原生共享功能的方法。

trans-unit.source: A web API for controlling a text-to-speech output.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于控制文本到语音输出的网络API。

trans-unit.source: A workaround for the lack of support in Firefox 31 - Firefox 48 is to use CSS variables. See this Stack Overflow answer for an example.
trans-unit.target: Firefox 31-Firefox 48中缺乏支持的一种解决方法是使用CSS变量。有关示例，请参见此堆栈溢出答案。

trans-unit.source: API allowing a more efficient way of running script-based animation, compared to traditional methods using timeouts. Also covers support for cancelAnimationFrame
trans-unit.target: 与使用超时的传统方法相比，API提供了一种更有效的方式来运行基于脚本的动画。还涵盖了对 cancelAnimationFrame 的支持

trans-unit.source: API allowing media data to be accessed from HTML video and audio elements.
trans-unit.target: 允许从HTML video 和 audio 元素访问媒体数据的API 。

trans-unit.source: API allowing the execution of JavaScript to be queued to run in idle browser time, either at the end of a frame or when the user is inactive. Also covers support for cancelIdleCallback. The API has similarities with requestAnimationFrame.
trans-unit.target: 该API允许将JavaScript的执行排队，以在空闲的浏览器时间内运行，无论是在帧结束时还是在用户不活动时。还介绍了对 cancelIdleCallback 的支持。该API与 requestAnimationFrame 有相似之处。

trans-unit.source: API for accessing selected content of a document, including the window.getSelection() method, as well as the selectstart & selectionchange events on document.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问文档的选定内容的API，包括 window.getSelection() 方法以及 document 上的 selectstart 和 selectionchange 事件。

trans-unit.source: API for accessing timing information related to navigation and elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问与导航和元素相关的时间信息的API。

trans-unit.source: API for accessing virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) devices, including sensors and head-mounted displays.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问虚拟现实(VR)和增强现实(AR)设备的API,包括传感器和头戴显示器。

trans-unit.source: API for accessing virtual reality (VR) devices, including sensors and head-mounted displays. Replaced by the WebXR Device API.
API for allowing content (like a video or canvas element) to take up the entire screen.
trans-unit.target: 用于允许内容(如视频或画布元素)占据整个屏幕的API。

trans-unit.source: API for better control over form field validation. Includes support for checkValidity(), setCustomValidity(), reportValidity() and validation states.
trans-unit.target: 用于更好地控制表单字段验证的API。包括对 checkValidity() ， setCustomValidity() ， reportValidity() 和验证状态的支持。

trans-unit.source: API for detecting orientation and motion events from the device running the browser.
trans-unit.target: 用于检测运行浏览器的设备的方向和运动事件的API。

trans-unit.source: API for finding out whether or not a media query applies to the document.
trans-unit.target: 用于查找媒体查询是否适用于文档的API。

trans-unit.source: API for manipulating files in the device's local file system (not in a sandbox).
API for plural sensitive formatting and plural language rules.

API that can be used to understand the visibility and position of DOM elements relative to a containing element or to the top-level viewport. The position is delivered asynchronously and is useful for understanding the visibility of elements and implementing pre-loading and deferred loading of DOM content.
trans-unit.target: API,可用于了解DOM元素相对于包含元素或顶层视口的可见性和位置。位置是异步传递的,对于理解元素的可见性和实现DOM内容的预加载和延迟加载非常有用。

trans-unit.source: API that provides a programmatic interface to the browser's credential manager. In short, an origin can request a user's credentials to sign them in, or can ask the browser to save credentials on the user's behalf. Both of these requests are user-mediated.
trans-unit.target: API,为浏览器的凭证管理器提供了一个编程接口。简而言之,原点可以请求用户的凭证来登录,也可以要求浏览器代表用户保存凭证。这两种请求都是以用户为媒介的。

trans-unit.source: API that provides access to raw mouse movement data. This is done by ignoring boundaries resulting from screen edges where the cursor can't go beyond, providing proper control for first person or real time strategy games.
trans-unit.target: API,提供对原始鼠标移动数据的访问。这是通过忽略光标无法超越的屏幕边缘所产生的边界来实现的,为第一人称或实时策略游戏提供了适当的控制。

trans-unit.source: API to allow messages to be pushed from a server to a browser, even when the site isn't focused or even open in the browser.
trans-unit.target: API允许消息从服务器推送到浏览器,即使网站没有被关注或甚至在浏览器中打开。

trans-unit.source: API to capture Real-Time video and audio from a DOM element, such as a <video>, <audio>, or <canvas> element via the captureStream method, in the form of a MediaStream
trans-unit.target: API以 MediaStream 的形式通过 captureStream 方法从DOM元素（例如 <video> ， <audio> 或 <canvas> 元素）捕获实时视频和音频的API

trans-unit.source: API to get the current computed CSS styles applied to an element. This may be the current value applied by an animation or as set by a stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: API来获取当前应用于元素的计算后的CSS样式。这可能是动画应用的当前值,也可能是样式表设置的值。

trans-unit.source: API to prevent devices from dimming, locking or turning off the screen when the application needs to keep running.
API to provide copy, cut and paste events as well as provide access to the OS clipboard.
trans-unit.target: API提供复制、剪切和粘贴事件,并提供对操作系统剪贴板的访问。

trans-unit.source: API to retrieve the various parts that make up a given URL from a given URL string.
trans-unit.target: API用于从一个给定的URL字符串中检索构成一个给定URL的各个部分。

trans-unit.source: API to support input from USB gamepad controllers through JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 通过JavaScript支持USB游戏手柄控制器输入的API。

trans-unit.source: AV1 (AOMedia Video 1) is a royalty-free video format by the Alliance for Open Media, meant to succeed its predecessor VP9 and compete with the HEVC/H.265 format.
trans-unit.target: AV1(AOMedia Video 1)是开放媒体联盟推出的一种免版税的视频格式,旨在接替其前身VP9,与HEVC/H.265格式竞争。

trans-unit.source: AVIF for Next-Generation Image Coding - blog post

trans-unit.target: 可中止的获取-谷歌开发者文章

trans-unit.source: According to http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=7531, text-shadow doesn't work on Android (at least 2.3, from testing) when the blur-radius is 0.
trans-unit.target: 根据http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=7531,当模糊半径为0时,文字阴影在安卓系统上无法使用(至少在2.3,从测试来看)。

trans-unit.source: Acts like the first character is always a letter even when it's not. For example, given "!,X;", "!," is matched instead of the entire string.
trans-unit.target: 就像第一个字符总是字母一样,即使它不是。例如,给定"!,X;","!,"会被匹配,而不是整个字符串。
火狐浏览器的 "XHTML Ruby支持 "插件

trans-unit.source: Additional browser compatibility tests for specific features
trans-unit.target: 特定功能的额外浏览器兼容性测试

trans-unit.source: Adds more functionality to XHR (aka AJAX) requests like file uploads, transfer progress information and the ability to send form data. Previously known as XMLHttpRequest Level 2, these features now appear simply in the XMLHttpRequest spec.
trans-unit.target: 向XHR（又名AJAX）请求添加更多功能，例如文件上传，传输进度信息以及发送表单数据的功能。这些功能以前称为XMLHttpRequest Level 2，现在仅出现在XMLHttpRequest规范中。

trans-unit.source: Advanced Audio Coding format, designed to be the successor format to MP3, with generally better sound quality.
trans-unit.target: 高级音频编码格式,旨在成为MP3的后续格式,音质普遍较好。

trans-unit.source: Advanced element selection using selectors including: [foo^="bar"], [foo$="bar"], [foo*="bar"], :root, :nth-child(), :nth-last-child(), :nth-of-type(), :nth-last-of-type(), :last-child, :first-of-type, :last-of-type, :only-child, :only-of-type, :empty, :target, :enabled, :disabled, :checked, :not(), ~ (general sibling)
trans-unit.target: 使用选择高级元素选择，包括： [foo^="bar"] ， [foo$="bar"] ， [foo*="bar"] ， :root ， :nth-child() ： :nth-last-child() ： :nth-of-type() ： :nth-last-of-type() ： :last-child ， :first-of-type ， :last-of-type ， :only-child ， :only-of-type ， :empty ， :target ， :enabled ， :disabled ， :checked ， :not() 〜 ~ 一般兄弟姐妹）

trans-unit.source: All browsers have removed support. The header was too complicated to use, and when incorrectly implemented, could completely block websites for longer periods of time.
All browsers support the CSS2 version of text-decoration, which matches only the text-decoration-line values (underline, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 所有浏览器均支持CSS2版本的 text-decoration ，该版本仅与 text-decoration-line 值（ underline 等）匹配

trans-unit.source: All major browser engines are working on implementing this spec.
Allow control of HTTP referrers via the referrer meta tag.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过referrer元标签控制HTTP引用者。

trans-unit.source: Allow nodes in an XML/HTML document to be traversed using XPath expressions.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用XPath表达式遍历XML/HTML文档中的节点。

trans-unit.source: Allows console functions to be used without throwing errors, but does not appear to output the data anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用 console 功能而不会引发错误，但似乎不会在任何地方输出数据。

trans-unit.source: Allows CSS background images to be positioned relative to the specified edge using the 3 to 4 value syntax. For example: background-position: right 5px bottom 5px; for positioning 5px from the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用3到4值语法将CSS背景图像相对于指定的边缘定位。例如： background-position: right 5px bottom 5px; 用于从右下角定位5px。

trans-unit.source: Allows CSS background images to be repeated without clipping.
trans-unit.target: 允许CSS背景图片在没有剪裁的情况下重复使用。

trans-unit.source: Allows CSS rules to be scoped to part of the document, based on the position of the style element. The attribute has been removed from the current specification.
trans-unit.target: 根据样式元素的位置，允许将CSS规则的作用域限定于文档的一部分。该属性已从当前规范中删除。

trans-unit.source: Allows a filter to be defined for what type of files a user may pick with from an <input type="file"> dialog
trans-unit.target: 允许为用户可以从 <input type="file"> 对话框选择的文件类型定义过滤器

trans-unit.source: Allows a form field to be immediately focused on page load.
trans-unit.target: 允许表单字段在页面加载时立即集中。

trans-unit.source: Allows a media query to be set based on the device pixels used per CSS unit. While the standard uses min/max-resolution for this, some browsers support the older non-standard device-pixel-ratio media query.
trans-unit.target: 允许根据每个CSS单位使用的设备像素设置媒体查询。尽管标准为此使用了 min / max-resolution ，但某些浏览器支持较旧的非标准 device-pixel-ratio 媒体查询。

trans-unit.source: Allows a media query to be set based on the presence and accuracy of the user's pointing device, and whether they have the ability to hover over elements on the page. This includes the pointer, any-pointer, hover, and any-hover media features.
trans-unit.target: 允许根据用户的指示设备的存在和准确性以及他们是否具有将鼠标悬停在页面上的元素上的能力来设置媒体查询。这包括 pointer ， any-pointer ， hover 和 any-hover 媒体功能。

trans-unit.source: Allows a set of CSS properties to be applied using a named variable
trans-unit.target: 允许使用一个命名的变量来应用一组CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Allows blending between CSS background images, gradients, and colors.
trans-unit.target: 允许在CSS背景图像、渐变和颜色之间进行混合。

trans-unit.source: Allows blending between arbitrary SVG and HTML elements
trans-unit.target: 允许在任意的SVG和HTML元素之间进行混合。

trans-unit.source: Allows communication with devices via USB (Universal Serial Bus).
trans-unit.target: 允许通过USB(通用串行总线)与设备通信。

trans-unit.source: Allows data to be sent asynchronously to a server with navigator.sendBeacon, even after a page was closed. Useful for posting analytics data the moment a user was finished using the page.
trans-unit.target: 即使关闭页面后，也允许使用 navigator.sendBeacon 将数据异步发送到服务器。在用户完成使用页面后发布分析数据时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Allows disabling all of the form control descendants of a fieldset via a disabled attribute on the fieldset element itself.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过fieldset元素本身的 disabled 属性禁用字段集的所有表单控件后代。

trans-unit.source: Allows elements to be animated along SVG paths or shapes via the offset-path property. Originally defined as the motion-path property.
trans-unit.target: 允许元素通过 offset-path 属性沿SVG路径或形状设置动画。最初定义为 motion-path 属性。

trans-unit.source: Allows files to be read synchronously in Web Workers
trans-unit.target: 允许在Web Workers中同步读取文件。

trans-unit.source: Allows for the heights and widths to be specified in intrinsic values using the max-content, min-content, fit-content and stretch (formerly fill) properties.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用 max-content ， min-content ， fit-content 和 stretch （以前为 fill ）属性在固有值中指定高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: Allows geometric shapes to be set in CSS to define an area for text to flow around. Includes properties shape-outside, shape-margin and shape-image-threshold
trans-unit.target: 允许在CSS中设置几何形状，以定义文本流转的区域。包括属性 shape-outside ， shape-margin 和 shape-image-threshold

trans-unit.source: Allows lines to be broken within words if an otherwise unbreakable string is too long to fit. Currently mostly supported using the word-wrap property.
trans-unit.target: 如果坚不可摧的字符串太长而无法容纳，则允许在单词内折行。当前主要支持使用 word-wrap 属性。

trans-unit.source: Allows more control when choosing system interface fonts
Allows objects to be created via URL constructor, but instances do not have the expected url properties.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过 URL 构造函数创建对象，但实例不具有预期的url属性。

trans-unit.source: Allows only part of a resource to be shown, based on the fragment identifier in the URL. Currently support is primarily limited to video track ranges.
trans-unit.target: 根据URL中的片段标识符,只允许显示资源的一部分。目前支持的范围主要限于视频轨迹范围。

trans-unit.source: Allows path objects to be declared on 2D canvas surfaces
trans-unit.target: 允许在2D画布表面声明路径对象。

trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic generation of images used by CSS
trans-unit.target: 允许程序化生成CSS使用的图像。

trans-unit.source: Allows representation of an indefinite number of arguments as an array.
trans-unit.target: 允许用数组表示无限个参数。

trans-unit.source: Allows running commands to manipulate the contents of an editable region in a document switched to designMode
trans-unit.target: 允许运行命令来操作切换到designMode的文档中可编辑区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: Allows some punctuation characters from start (or the end) of text elements to be placed "outside" of the box in order to preserve the reading flow.
trans-unit.target: 允许将文本元素开始(或结束)的一些标点符号放在框外,以保持阅读的流畅性。

trans-unit.source: Allows styling specifically for the first line of text using the ::first-line pseudo-element. Note that only a limited set of properties can be applied.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用 ::first-line 伪元素专门为文本的第一行设置样式。请注意，只能应用有限的属性集。

trans-unit.source: Allows text beyond maxlength to be entered at first, but removes all characters past the maxlength when focus is lost.
trans-unit.target: 允许输入超过maxlength的文字,但当失去焦点时,会删除超过maxlength的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: Allows the browser's Do Not Track setting to be queried via navigator.doNotTrack.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过 navigator.doNotTrack 查询浏览器的“不跟踪”设置。

trans-unit.source: Allows users to select multiple files in the file picker.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户在文件拾取器中选择多个文件。

trans-unit.source: Allows validation of an input field based on a given regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 允许根据给定的正则表达式模式对输入字段进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Allows web sites to communicate over GATT with nearby user-selected Bluetooth devices in a secure and privacy-preserving way.
trans-unit.target: 允许网站通过GATT与附近的用户选择的蓝牙设备以安全和保护隐私的方式进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Allows websites to create a floating video window that is always on top of other windows so that users may continue consuming media while they interact with other sites or applications on their device.
Already part of the SVG specification, and all SVG-supporting browsers appear to support the property on SVG elements.
trans-unit.target: 已经是SVG规范的一部分,所有支持SVG的浏览器似乎都支持SVG元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: Also supported in the (now discontinued) Firefox OS, but not Firefox for other OSes.
trans-unit.target: 也支持(现已停产)Firefox操作系统,但不支持其他操作系统的Firefox。

trans-unit.source: Also supports the :-webkit-any() pseudo-class, which is deprecated due to handling specificity incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 还支持 :-webkit-any() 伪类，该伪类由于处理不正确而被弃用。

trans-unit.source: Also supports the value of invert for outline-color. (support of this value is optional for browsers)
trans-unit.target: 同时支持的价值 invert 为 outline-color 。（对于浏览器，此值的支持是可选的）

trans-unit.source: An API for complex rendering and compute, using hardware acceleration. Use cases include demanding 3D games and acceleration of scientific calculations. Meant to supersede WebGL.
An API that forces developers to be very explicit about their use of powerful DOM-injection APIs. Can greatly improve security against XSS attacks.
An HTTP header which indicates whether the browser should allow the webpage to be displayed in a frame within another webpage. Used as a defense against clickjacking attacks.
trans-unit.target: 一个HTTP头,用于指示浏览器是否应该允许网页在另一个网页的框架中显示。用来防御点击劫持攻击。

trans-unit.source: An Introduction to HTML5 web messaging
An Introduction to WebVTT and track
An explicit, non-whitespace spelling of the descendant combinator. A >> B is equivalent to A B.
trans-unit.target: 后代组合器的显式非空格拼写。 A >> B 等于 A B 。

trans-unit.source: An extension to the TLS computer networking protocol by which a client indicates which hostname it is attempting to connect to at the start of the handshaking process.
trans-unit.target: TLS计算机网络协议的一个扩展,客户端在握手过程开始时,通过该扩展表明它正试图连接到哪个主机名。

trans-unit.source: An extraordinarily optimizable, low-level subset of JavaScript, intended to be a compile target from languages like C++.
trans-unit.target: 一个特别优化的、低级的JavaScript子集,旨在成为C++等语言的编译目标。

trans-unit.source: Android 2.2 - 3.0 are reported not to support local() value
Android 2.2-2.3 do not support the capture attribute
Android 2.3 cannot read data-* properties from select elements.
trans-unit.target: Android 2.3无法从 select 元素读取 data-* 属性。

trans-unit.target: 如果在同一元素上使用多个背景图片属性来实现,Android 2.x除了不显示SVG外,还将不显示回退背景图片。(例如:PNG背景图回退+SVG背景图)

Android 4.3 and lower (together with older WebKit browsers) have issues when combining pseudo classes with adjacent or general sibling selectors.

trans-unit.target: 据报道，Android 4.3及更低版本的浏览器不支持 background-size 百分比

trans-unit.source: Android intent:// URLs can be used instead.
Android Browser 2.3 does not support % value for border-radius.

trans-unit.target: Android和一些旧版本的WebKit(可能在各种webview实现中找到)不支持Access-Control-Expose-Headers:https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=56726。

trans-unit.target: Android浏览器不能正确计算HTML选择元素的尺寸(宽度和高度)。

trans-unit.target: Opera中支持属性类型的动画

Appears to exist in Safari Technology Preview but does not work in current build. Should work in next preview build

Append ellipsis when text overflows its containing element

trans-unit.target: Apple提供了等效的专有API，称为Apple Pay JS。Google 为Apple Pay JS提供了PaymentRequest包装器。

trans-unit.source: As ES6 refers to a huge specification and browsers have various levels of support, "Supported" means at least 95% of the spec is supported. "Partial support" refers to at least 10% of the spec being supported. For full details see the Kangax ES6 support table.
As a compatibility measure, Firefox continues to fire the click event for document and window level event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种兼容性措施,Firefox继续为文档和窗口级事件处理程序发射点击事件。

trans-unit.source: As described in detail below, many modern browsers ignore the off value on certain fields in certain cases intentionally in order to give the user more control over autofilling fields. One example is the use of password managers.
trans-unit.target: 如下所述，许多现代浏览器在某些情况下会故意忽略某些字段的 off 值，以使用户对自动填充字段有更多的控制权。一个示例是使用密码管理器。

trans-unit.source: As of Chrome 47, the getUserMedia API cannot be called from insecure origins.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 47开始,不能从不安全的源头调用getUserMedia API。

trans-unit.source: As the page is zoomed in the number of device pixels that one CSS pixel covers increases, and therefore the value of devicePixelRatio will also increase.
trans-unit.target: 随着页面的放大,一个CSS像素所覆盖的设备像素数会增加,因此devicePixelRatio的值也会增加。

trans-unit.source: As the specification includes many JavaScript features, un-numbered partial support varies widely and is shown in detail on the ECMAScript 5 compatibility tables by Kangax.
As the specification includes many JavaScript features, un-numbered partial support varies widely and is shown in detail on the ECMAScript 5 compatibilty tables by Kangax.

trans-unit.target: 由于没有规范，并且该属性依赖于flexbox的过时实现（因此 display: -webkit-box ），因此其他浏览器不太可能按原样支持该属性，尽管有时可以使用替代解决方案来代替它。

Async function make it possible to treat functions returning Promise objects as if they were synchronous.

trans-unit.target: 浏览器在何时应该检查拼写时,会有不同的表现(如立即或仅在焦点时)。

trans-unit.source: Browsers can have differing behavior when HTML CSS properties are set on SVG elements, for example Edge & IE browsers do not respond to the height property while Chrome does.

trans-unit.source: Browsers have different behavior in how they deal with spellchecking in combination with the the lang attribute. Generally spelling is based on the browser's language, not the language of the document.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在与 lang 属性结合使用时如何处理拼写检查有不同的行为。通常，拼写是基于浏览器的语言，而不是文档的语言。

trans-unit.source: Browsers have generally decided to not implement DNSSEC validation because the added complexity outweighs the improvements to the browser. DNSSEC is still useful as it is widely used to protect delivery of records between DNS servers, only failing to protect the delivery from the last DNS server to the browser.

trans-unit.source: Chrome has an issue that occurs when using the will-change property on a selector which also has background-attachment: fixed defined. It causes the image to get cut off and gain whitespace around it.

trans-unit.source: Chrome has problems selecting options from the select element when using box-sizing: border-box and browser zoom level is less than 100%.

trans-unit.source: Chrome is now defaulting to strict-origin-when-cross-origin which is the recommended setting for most use-cases.

Chrome is reported to incorrectly calculate the container height, and often breaks on margins, padding, and can display 1px of the next column at the bottom of the previous column. Part of these issues can be solved by adding -webkit-perspective:1; to the column container. This creates a new stacking context for the container, and apparently causes chrome to (re)calculate column layout.
trans-unit.target: 据报道，Chrome浏览器的容器高度计算不正确，并且经常在边距，填充边上中断，并且可能在上一列的底部显示下一列的1px。这些问题的一部分可以通过添加 -webkit-perspective:1; 来解决。到列容器。这为容器创建了一个新的堆叠上下文，并且显然导致chrome（重新）计算列布局。
